body_html:
I am using python 3.6 (anaconda ) . All the steps worked for me except for the last one -
pip install tensorflow
I get the following output on console.
Collecting tensorflow
Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement tensorflow (from versions: )
No matching distribution found for tensorflow. Any idea what should I do to make it work ?

body:
I am using python 3.6 (anaconda ) . All the steps worked for me except for the last one - 
pip install tensorflow
I get the following output on console.
Collecting tensorflow
  Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement tensorflow (from versions: )
No matching distribution found for tensorflow. Any idea what should I do to make it work ?
